description: Physics 131, the second course in the three-semester calculus-based sequence, treats electricity, magnetism, and electromagnetic waves. There is one 2.5 hour laboratory meeting per week. Prerequisites: Physics 130 and concurrent registration in (or previous completion of) Mathematics 126 or 128. Offered Spring Semester.
name: Analytical III
notes: Students in Physics 232 must also register for lab 232 AL or BL.
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Physics 130 and concurrent registration in (or previous completion of) Mathematics 126 or 128. Offered Spring Semester.
title: Analytical Physics II
